snippet.title: Betrayed Alliance - free fan-made Sierra-style Game
snippet.description:
Free to DL here - http://sciwiki.sierrahelp.com/index.php?title=Betrayed_Alliance

Walkthrough - https://www.dropbox.com/s/4ojveggmbuy6qdh/Betrayed%20Alliance%20Walkthrough.docx

Betrayed Alliance is an SCI game created using Sierra's custom built adventure game making engine. It features all the adventure conventions made famous by Sierra but is a completely independant game developed almost solely by me.

Book 1 of Betrayed Alliance will be released Christmas Eve 2013 at the SCI Programming Community. Check it out to get monthly progress on the game's development!
www.sciprogramming.com
